More to explore
at Utopia

Check out what's happening at Fresh ‘n Wild Utopia. From great specials to weekends filled with music.

Entertaing made easy. Choose from our platters for any occassion.

Wild Living Boutique stocks a wide variety of unique gifts and artisan goods for the art lover or home decorator.

Opening Hours:

Monday - Saturday: 7:00 – 22:00
Sunday: 7:30 – 16:30
